name: Fixed Deposits
details: Enjoy a fixed rate of return HNB offers a multitude of fixed deposit schemes for varying tenures to suit your convenience. We offer simple reinvestment fixed deposits at very competitive interest rates which can be opened with a minimum investment of Rs. 25,000/- Start your savings journey today High interest rate Remit/credit your interest to any party of your choice Individually/jointly maintain your term deposit, you may appoint a nominee Arrange an instant soft loan up to a maximum of 90% of the deposit Collect your interest monthly or at maturity
